name: LootChestPlusPlus
title: Loot Chest++
author: Oktabyte, PiggyWhiskey, fishycat
description:
Updated for Warptorio Compatibility 
Automagically collects alien-artifacts, corpses, alien-biomass, artifact-ore, coins and flesh. Useful in combination with artillery. 
Convenient for mods that add loot when aliens die, like Bob's mods, Necromant, Reika's EndgameCombat, Alien Loot Economy and Alien Space Science. 
The chest acts now as a passive provider chest and gets unlocked with logistic-robotitcs tech.
